short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An application that lets you take notes on specific pages, and come back to them later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you ever wish you could take notes that "stick" to websites? Now you can? This extension lets you take domain-specific notes that will persist even after you close the browser.
